content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnaces. For instance, the error "Could not insert: No iron-ore to insert from your inventory" indicates that the agent attempted to insert iron ore without having any in inventory.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. This can prevent errors related to occupied tiles.
